title: Russia-Ukraine war LIVE | We won't send troops but another Nato country may, says US envoy to UN - India Today
content:
1. Russia-Ukraine war LIVE | We won't send troops but another Nato country may, says US envoy to UN  India Today
  2. Watch: Zelensky's peace message to Putin as Russians advance into Mariupol; Slams Nestle  Hindustan Times
  3. Russia-Ukraine war live updates: At least six dead in overnight bombing in Ukraine's Kyiv  Times of India
  4. Russia-Ukraine War LIVE Updates: 6 Dead in Overnight Bombing in Kyiv; Biden to Visit Poland to Discuss Cris  News18
  5. Russia-Ukraine crisis live updates | Ukraine refuses to surrender Mariupol as Russia warns of humanitarian ‘catastrophe’  The Hindu
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Russia-Ukraine War LIVE Updates: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy, while addressing Israel's Parliament on the Russian invasion, drew comparisons between the Russian offensive and the "final solution" - the plan by Nazi Germany to exterminate Jews. Earlier in the day, Zelenskyy said that he's "ready for negotiations" with Russian President Vladimir Putin but warned that if they fail "that would mean that this is a third World War." Meanwhile, the United Nations said on Sunday that as many as ten million people have now fled their homes in Ukraine due to Russia's "devastating" war. Stay with IndiaToday.in for LIVE updates.
